channel.title: CVE Feed for Kyocera Document Solutions, TA Triumph-Adler GmbH, and Olivetti SpA -- KYOCERA Mobile Print, UTAX/TA MobilePrint, and Olivetti Mobile Print
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kyocera Document Solutions, TA Triumph-Adler GmbH, and Olivetti SpA -- KYOCERA Mobile Print, UTAX/TA MobilePrint, and Olivetti Mobile Print

item.title: CVE-2023-25954|2024-08-02T11:39:05.951Z -- kyocera%20document%20solutions%2C%20ta%20triumph-adler%20gmbh%2C%20and%20olivetti%20spa -- kyocera%20mobile%20print%2C%20utax%2Fta%20mobileprint%2C%20and%20olivetti%20mobile%20print
item.description: KYOCERA Mobile Print' v3.2.0.230119 and earlier, 'UTAX/TA MobilePrint' v3.2.0.230119 and earlier, and 'Olivetti Mobile Print' v3.2.0.230119 and earlier are vulnerable to improper intent handling. When a malicious app is installed on the victim user's Android device, the app may send an intent and direct the affected app to download malicious files or apps to the device without notification.
